data.app_name: Wallace & Gromit in The Grand Getaway
data.description:
# WE ARE NOMINATED FOR THE 2024 EMMY AWARD ‚≠ê

Wallace and Gromit are preparing for a well-earned golfing getaway, but mishaps and mayhem send them hurtling off course!

Step into Wallace & Gromit's shoes and blast off on a joyful narrative VR adventure that will transport you from the warmth of West Wallaby Street to the dangers of Deep Space!

{443369981776914}

üêæ **Play as Wallace, Gromit, and their brand-new contraption Auto-Caddy!**

üïπÔ∏è **Enjoy re-playable mini-games** along the way. 

ü™ê **Discover strange worlds** and encounter new life forms. 

üé• **Explore iconic environments** in a story full of the heart and humour of a classic Aardman film. 

{1973867766343299}

# üïπÔ∏è + MR Mini-Game: Jamtastic!

This time YOU're the star. With Wallace off on his Grand Getaway, it's time for you (and your room) to put his ‚Äòjam to toast‚Äô delivery system through its paces.

{752134890440442}

Tackle a torrent of toasted targets and prove yourself a Top Tester. Just try not to make too much mess...

üî´ **30 unique levels** of jamtastic fun. 

üéØ Tackle toast and more to achieve the highest score and **prove your top tester skills**! 

üëã **Enjoy check-ins from Wallace** as he dials in ‚Äòlive‚Äô from his Grand Getaway. 

‚ö†Ô∏è The Helping Hands take no responsibility for any crumbs or jam that may appear around your home! ‚ö†Ô∏è

{436723765662713}

From the multi-award-winning independent animation studio Aardman (Wallace & Gromit, Chicken Run, Shaun the Sheep) and immersive storytelling expert Atlas V (Madrid Noir, Gloomy Eyes).
